On www.bilibili.com, the current filter rules: ``` bilibili.com#?#.bili-video-card > div.bili-video-card__wrap > a[href*="cm.bilibili.com"][data-target-url]:not([data-target-url*=".bili"]):upward(2) bilibili.com#?#.bili-video-card:has(> .bili-video-card__wrap > .bili-video-card__info > .bili-video-card__info--right > .bili-video-card__info--tit > a > [class^="bili-video-card__info--ad"]) bilibili.com#?#.eva-extension-feed-body > div:not([class], [id]):has(> .bili-video-card > .bili-video-card__wrap > .bili-video-card__info > .bili-video-card__info--right > .bili-video-card__info--tit > a > [class^="bili-video-card__info--ad"]) bilibili.com#?#.bili-video-card:has(> .bili-video-card__wrap > .bili-video-card__info > .bili-video-card__info--right > .bili-video-card__info--tit > a > .bili-video-card__info--creative-img) bilibili.com##.bili-video-card__wrap > a[href^="http"]:not([href*=".bilibili.com/"]) bilibili.com##a[href*="cm.bilibili.com"][data-target-url*="gaoneng.bilibili.com"] bilibili.com##a[href*="cm.bilibili.com"][data-target-url*="gaoneng.bilibili.com"] + .bili-video-card__info bilibili.com##a[href*="cm.bilibili.com"][data-target-url]:not([data-target-url*=".bili"]) bilibili.com##a[href*="cm.bilibili.com"][data-target-url]:not([data-target-url*=".bili"]) + .bili-video-card__info ``` from `AdGuard Chinese filter` produces ad leftovers occupying space (as in the screenshots 1,2). Also, rules 2-4 do not work with the new version of the website. This can be fixed by adding the following rule (with the previous ones removed). ``` bilibili.com##.bili-video-card__wrap > a[href*="cm.bilibili.com"]:upward(.bili-video-card) ``` 2. Screenshots

Screenshot 2: Previous rules enabled, DOM inspector off
Screenshot 3: Suggested rule enabled, previous rule disabled, DOM inspector on
Screenshot 4: Suggested rule enabled, previous rule disabled, DOM inspector off
